meanings.definition: The state or quality of having prominent jowls.
meanings.sent1: Her jowlinesses were quite noticeable, giving her a distinguished look.
meanings.sent2: The bulldog's jowlinesses added to its adorable appearance.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa joked that his jowlinesses were a sign of wisdom and experience.
meanings.sent4: The jowlinesses of the basset hound seemed to droop with every step.
meanings.sent5: The jowlinesses of the walrus were a defining feature of its face.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being chubby or having excess flesh around the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The baby's jowlinesses made everyone want to pinch his cheeks.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel's jowlinesses were more pronounced after hibernation.
meanings.sent3: The jowlinesses of the pug made it look like it was always smiling.
meanings.sent4: The jowlinesses of the chipmunk seemed to grow as it collected more food.
meanings.sent5: The jowlinesses of the hamster made it look like it was storing extra food.

meanings.definition: The appearance of sagging or drooping skin around the lower face.
meanings.sent1: As she aged, her jowlinesses became more pronounced, giving her a tired look.
meanings.sent2: The jowlinesses of the bloodhound swayed as it sniffed the ground.
meanings.sent3: The jowlinesses of the cat made it look like it was always frowning.
meanings.sent4: The jowlinesses of the bulldog seemed to hang like curtains around its face.
meanings.sent5: The jowlinesses of the elderly elephant added to its wise appearance.
